text: The 1933 Tour de Hongrie was the eighth edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 28 June to 2 July 1933. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Kurt Stettler. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1933 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 28 June | Budapest to Pécs | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 29 June | Pécs to Szombathely | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 30 June | Szombathely to Székesfehérvár | | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text- align:right;" | 1 July | Székesfehérvár to Győr | | |- ! scope="col" | 5 | style="text-align:right;" | 2 July | Győr to Budapest | | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | Switzerland | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Switzerland | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 17" |- | style="text- align:center;" | 3 | | Hungary A | style="text-align:right;" | + 12' 20" |} |} ==References== 1933 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
title: 1933 Tour de Hongrie
